sql.content: insert into sys_user(name, age, sex) values( #{name}, #{age, dataType=integer}, #{sex} )
insert into sys_user2(id, name, age, sex) values(#{id, defaultValue=douglei23fxxxx}, #{name}, #{age, dataType=integer}, #{sex} )
insert into sys_user(name, age, sex) values( #{user.name}, #{user.age, dataType=integer}, #{user.sex} )
insert into sys_user2(id, name, age, sex) values(#{user.id, defaultValue=xxx}, #{user.name}, #{user.age, dataType=integer}, #{user.sex} )
